name: pogi
description: An easy PostgreSQL query handler on top of pg.js

scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.release_patch: npm version patch; conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r2; git add --all ./; git commit -m"chore:generate changelog"; git push; npm publish
scripts.release_minor: npm version minor; conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r2; git add --all ./; git commit -m"chore:generate changelog"; git push; npm publish
scripts.release_major: npm version minor; conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r2; git add --all ./; git commit -m"chore:generate changelog"; git push; npm publish

author: Laszlo Radics<laszlo.radics@labcup.net>, Geza Radics<radicsge@protonmail.com>
